body_html: @varoslavvb it depends on the underlying memcpy implementation. If the memcpy on the system is Numa-aware, multithreaded and uses full simd, it should be the same or faster than the Add codepath
body_text: @varoslavvb it depends on the underlying memcpy implementation. If the memcpy on the system is Numa-aware, multithreaded and uses full simd, it should be the same or faster than the Add codepath
body: @varoslavvb it depends on the underlying memcpy implementation. If the memcpy on the system is Numa-aware, multithreaded and uses full simd, it should be the same or faster than the Add codepath
